XXmsitvatu:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
XXmsitvatu:3: śītavane mahāśmaśāne iṅghikāyatanapratyuddeśe tatrāyuṣmān rāhulo 'tīva viheṭhyate /
XXmsitvatu:4_0: devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣagrahair marutagrahair asuragrahair kinnaragrahair
XXmsitvatu:4_1: garuḍagrahair gandharvagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahair pretagrahair
XXmsitvatu:4_2: bhūtagrahair piśācagrahair kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair
XXmsitvatu:5: athāyuṣmān rāhulo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ purato rudann aśrūṇi pravartayati sma /
XXmsitvatu:6: atha bhagavān jānann eva rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
XXmsitvatu:7: kiṃ tvaṃ rāhula mama prataḥ sthitvā aśrūṇi pravartayasi /
XXmsitvatu:8: evam ukte āyuṣmān rāhulo bhagavantam etad avocat /
XXmsitvatu:9: ihāhaṃ bhagavan rājagṛhe viharāmi śītavane mahāśmaśāne iṅghikāyatanapratyuddeśe [Mś_2] so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tatra viheṭhye /
XXmsitvatu:10_0: devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣasagrahair marutagrahair asuragrahair kinnaragrahair
XXmsitvatu:10_1: garuḍagrahair gandharvagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahair pretagrahair
XXmsitvatu:10_2: bhūtagrahair piśācagrahair kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair
XXmsitvatu:11: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
XXmsitvatu:12: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ rāhula imāṃ mahāśītavatī nāma dhāraṇīṃ vidyāṃ /
XXmsitvatu:13: catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ ca dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya yogakṣemāya bhaviṣyati //

XXmsitvatu:98: cara nāḍi culu nāḍi culu nāḍi vāgbandhani /

XXmsitvatu:127_0: asyāṃ khalu punā rāhula mahāśītavatīvidyāyāṃ daśottarapadaśatāyāṃ sūtre granthiṃ
XXmsitvatu:127_1: baddhvā hastena dhāryamānāyāṃ kaṇṭhena dhāryamānāyāṃ samantād yojanaśatasya rakṣākṛtā bhaviṣyati [Mś_5] /
XXmsitvatu:128: gandhair vā puṣpair vā mudrābhir vā naiva manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vābhibhaviṣyati /
XXmsitvatu:129: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ na rogo na jvaro na prajvaro na vidyāmantro na vetāḍaḥ /
XXmsitvatu:130: na vyādhinā nāgninā na viṣodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati /
XXmsitvatu:131: vidyāmantraprayogānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhuprayuktānāṃ cāsiddhānāṃ siddhakarī /
XXmsitvatu:137: yo graho na muñcet saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrdhā arjakasyeva mañjarī /
XXmsitvatu:138: vajrapāṇiś cāsya mahāyakṣasenāpatir vajreṇādīptena prajvālitena ekajvālībhūtena tāvad vyāyacched yāvan mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayet /
XXmsitvatu:139: catvāraś ca mahārājāno 'yomayena cakreṇa mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayeyuḥ /
XXmsitvatu:140: kṣuradhārāprahāreṇa vināśayeyus tasmāc ca yakṣalokācyavanaṃ bhaveyuḥ /
XXmsitvatu:142: atha khalu punā rāhula mahāśītavatīmahāvidyāyāṃ sakṛtparivartitāyāṃ rājacaurodakāgniviṣaśastrāṭavīkāntāramadhyagataḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimucyate /
XXmsitvatu:143: iyaṃ khalu punar mahāśītavatī vidyā [Mś_6] ekanavatyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamair buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitā bhāṣiṣyate bhāṣyate ca siddhā paramasiddhā siddhaparākramā /
XXmsitvatu:145: sarvabhayopadraveṣu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kuru /
XXmsitvatu:146: śivam ārogyam abhayaṃ ca sarvadā sarvathā sarvataḥ sarvāvasthāsu bhavantu //
XXmsitvatu:147: idam avocat bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān rāhulaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhabhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
